case.state: So who runs this dump, the Gambling Club president? Whatever, let's do this, Senketsu!
If you think strip poker's gonna stop me, you're nuts! You ready, Senketsu?
I'm the last girl that's gonna be scared off by a little stripping! C'mon, Senketsu!
You ready, Senketsu? Let's teach these pricks we mean business!
I can handle you jerks no problem! Let's get started already!
(Ryuko, calm down and assess the situation.) Hey, I've got this!
Damn place doesn't even look like Honnouji. Must be some weird illusion trick.
(Be careful, Ryuko. Challenging you to strip poker is likely a plot to separate us.) Hey, I know that!
...~cards~. I guess.
Ah, jeez, I dunno...~cards~.
(Take ~cards~, Ryuko.) Hey, I know how to play!
(~cards~ cards.) I know tha--hey, good call.
...Whatever.
~cards~. ...Hey, I don't have all day!
~cards~. ...Hey, Senketsu, you're itching a little.
This part's so boring...
When's the last time I played poker anyway? I don't know what I'm doing...
...OK, pairs are good. ~cards~.
I'm feelin' this swap. ~cards~.
Call me batshit crazy, but...~cards~!
Wha...~cards~.
~cards~. ...~cards~.
~cards~. And if they're bad, you're gonna eat crap!
Uhh...~cards~, I guess. I'm not a poker player.
~cards~, Ryuko. Your blood is tasting odd.
~cards~, Senketsu? (~cards~.)
Are you gonna swap me or not? Hurry up!
Hit me. ...For real if you wanna see what happens.
~cards~...c'mon, don't make me keep askin'.
~cards~ is all I'm gonna need to take you down!
What's this crap? ~cards~.
Do we really have to keep goin' through this crap? What's the point of this game?
'Soon as I figure out where the leader is, I'm...ugh, gimme ~cards~.
Dealer's pissin' me off...~cards~!
...~cards~? ~cards~. ...Yeah.
...What're you lookin' at, ~player~? I'm fine.
Hehe. Never played poker much, but even I know this is great.
...Hey Senketsu, you got a good poker face, right?
This is a good hand, right? ...Senketsu? (Yes. It is of higher value than--) Yeah, got it.
(Ryuko, your heartbeat is rapid. Is this sexual interest?) W-what? No, my hand's good, that's all!
Poker face? Who do you take me for, that bitch Satsuki Kiryuin? I'll kick your asses with a smile!
Hey, the good stuff's just rollin' in, Senketsu! I knew this game would be a cakewalk!
(Ryuko--! ...I have to use the bathroom! But I'm rooting for you!) Uh...thanks?
You won't have to strip alone, Ryuko! Mako Mankanshoku is on the scene!
Hold it! Ryuko's strength comes from her friends, because that's how cool she is! I'll strip with her!
Hold it! You can't just tell Ryuko to strip and expect her to do it alone! Mako Mankanshoku will support her, no matter what!
Halt! This hand is great, so Ryuko won't be stripping! But if she did, she won't do it alone!
Ryuko is cool and will never have to strip anyway! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will not abandon her!
Stupid game...why'm I playin' this? Can't your leader come out and fight me?
I don't like the looks a' this place...and why're there so many girls around?
...You feel it too, don't you, Senketsu? Somethin's off about this whole building...
Looks like I'm doin' pretty well so far. You chumps woulda been better off just fightin' me--it'd be over quicker.
Ryuko! I have no idea how to play cards but good luck! You can beat these guys!
Maybe you dunno, but I'm a celebrity at Honnouji--as the girl who's gonna take Satsuki Kiryuin down! So start kissin' my ass, not hers.
(I would be wary of ~player~, Ryuko. The energy she gives off is unlike anyone else here.) Hey, I scoped her out, don't worry!
(I would be wary of ~player~, Ryuko. The energy he gives off is unlike anyone else here.) Hey, I scoped him out, don't worry!
You won't have to strip alone, Ryuko! Mako Mankanshoku is on the scene!
Hold it! Ryuko's strength comes from her friends, because that's how cool she is! I'll strip with her!
Hold it! You can't just tell Ryuko to strip and expect her to do it alone! Mako Mankanshoku will support her, no matter what!
Halt! This hand is so-so, and that's all Ryuko needs because she's awesome! But if she loses, she won't lose alone!
Ryuko is cool and will never have to strip anyway! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will not abandon her!
Aw, jeez...
Aw, bullshit! I swapped perfectly good cards out for this crap!
H-hey, Senketsu, what gives? I swapped out the cards you said! (This game is largely luck-based, Ryuko.)
Damn it, this is crap! Dealer! Are you playin' favorites? Hey!
...I don't see any pairs. Senketsu, am I workin' with anything here? (Are they all the same suit?) What's a suit?
Damn it, I dunno how to play this! My old gang just smashed mailboxes n' stuff, not...gambled.
OK, I think I played poker like, once. N' this is trash.
You won't have to strip alone, Ryuko! Mako Mankanshoku is on the scene!
Hold it! Ryuko's strength comes from her friends, because that's how cool she is! I'll strip with her!
Hold it! You can't just tell Ryuko to strip and expect her to do it alone! Mako Mankanshoku will support her, no matter what!
Halt! This hand is terrible, so Ryuko will strip now! But she won't strip alone!
Ryuko is cool, even if she's about to lose this hand! But I, Mako Mankanshoku, will not abandon her!
Yare yare daze...what an annoying bitch.
Another foolish girl seeks to challenge Ryuko? Yare yare daze...
Yare yare daze...this woman is too weak for you, Ryuko. I, Honnouji Fight Club President, will handle her...
Yare yare daze...you bitch. You have no business with Ryuko.
Is this girl bothering you, Ryuko? Yare yare daze...she has not come alone.
Yare yare daze...this girl belongs back in prison.
Yare yare daze...I will handle this Jotaro boy, Ryuko. Don't concern yourself with him...
Another foolish boy trying to challenge Ryuko? Yare yare daze...
Yare yare daze...this boy isn't worth your time, Ryuko. I, Honnouji Fight Club President, will handle him...
Yare yare daze...you asshole. You have no business with Ryuko.
Is this boy bothering you, Ryuko? Yare yare daze...I'll clean things up here.
What a beautiful duwang...and what an annoying opponent. Yare yare daze...
Another man wasting Ryuko's time with his advances? Yare yare daze...
Yare yare daze...this man is pure evil, Ryuko. I, Honnouji Fight Club President, will handle him...
Yare yare daze...you asshole. You have no business with Ryuko.
Is this man bothering you, Ryuko? Yare yare daze...I sense a terrifying Stand.
Uh, her? That's my friend Mako...she's a little weird. But she lets me live with her, and she knows the school better than I do...
...What're you all starin' at? Oh, uh, the girl who popped up? She's my friend Mako...no, I don't know how she makes that spotlight.
O-oh, uh...don't mind that girl, Mako. She's my friend...n' she's a little out there sometimes.
What're you starin' at, huh? Yeah, my friend Mako tags along with me. She lets me live with her--you got a problem with that?
D-don't look at me like that! What, like none a' you have a crazy friend? Mako lets me live at her house!
I-I can't believe this crap...! Listen, I strip 'cause a' Senketsu, but this sex stuff is--I-I'm not used to--sex stuff!
J-jeez, how messed-up is this place? I'm not some kinda slut who gets off to this! I-I mean, I haven't even--done sex stuff!
D-does Satsuki Kiryuin expect me to be some kinda pervert because of how Kamuis look? I haven't done--y-y'know, sex stuff!
T-they're goin' even faster now! Nudity's one thing, OK? What makes you think I'm some kinda--expert on sex, or whatever? I'm not!
Ugh...t-this whole damn club was a setup for Satsuki Kiryuin to laugh at me! Yeah, I haven't done any sex stuff, did ya want me to admit that?
What do you want from me, huh? 'Course I'm embarrassed with sex stuff--I strip, sure, but I never had--like, a boyfriend!
Y-yeah, laugh it up, big bad stripper-girl Matoi's not used to hardcore sex stuff! Y-you think a punk like me ever had a--a boyfriend?
Well, y'know what? I'm not gonna back down from this sex crap! Hear that, Satsuki Kiryuin? I can flirt with the best of 'em!
Well, fine, then! Student Council thinks they're gonna rattle me with a little sex stuff? They forgot just what punkass girl they're dealin' with!
Alright, alright, so this game hits full-on sex crap. I bet those Three-Stars think they're some kinda sex masters, laughin' at me--I can flirt!
Y'know what? I win fights 'cause me n' Senketsu adapt! You think you're gonna scare me with sex crap, then just try me!
Y'know what this proves to me? Satsuki Kiryuin can't beat me in a fight, so she just tries to embarrass me to death. You wanna flirt, maybe I will!
My name's Ryuko Matoi, and I ain't here to play games! I'm droppin' this poker crap if anyone pulls somethin'!
Ryuko Matoi. Any of you more of Satsuki Kiryuin's mooks? Yeah, you are. And I'll make you talk!
I'm Ryuko Matoi, and I know damn well how to use this sword. I got other weapons, too, but we'll see if you talk before I use 'em.
Looks like yet another buncha losers tryin' to suck up to Satsuki Kiryuin and score a Goku Uniform. Not happenin'!
You dumbasses picked the wrong girl to mess with. Soon as I get you naked and on your knees, you're gonna talk.
I don't know what dumbass thought strip poker would scare me, but I'll show my body if that's what it takes to win!
Yeah, yeah, I know how these gimmicks go. Some dumbass club president is gonna give their speech soon, and I'll slice 'em up.
My name's Ryuko Matoi. And as soon as I find out who's runnin' this stupid game, I'm gonna squash 'em!
Name's Ryuko Matoi. Let's see if any of you chumps are worth the sharp side a' this thing.
Ryuko Matoi. You ever heard of the Kanto Vagabond? Yeah, that's me--which one a' you's the leader?
Wha--girlfriend? You have a girlfriend? I thought you were some kinda stripper!
Girlfriend? A big-boobed woman like you is a...a lesbo, or somethin'?
Girlfriend? L-like, you're dating another girl? That's not what I expected outta--a girl dressed like you!
Girlfriend? H-hey, back up a second! Since when do makeup-wearin' blondes date other girls? That's a punk thing!
W-what? How'd you know I was made in a lab? Yeah, I'm part alien, what's it to ya?
E-engineered? How'd you know that? Does Satsuki Kiryuin know I'm part Life Fiber?
H-hey, what are you talkin' about me bein' engineered for, Blue-suit? I never told anyone I'm part Life Fiber!
Who--yeah. Yeah, I actually was engineered. My hair's like this thanks to Life Fiber genes--how'd you know that?
Ew, I'm nothin' like you! You're all gross and tatted-up and smokin'! And ya hang out in strip poker bars!
As if, bitch! I'm not some kinda stupid ghetto rat like you--I got a mission, and it's avenging my dad! So piss off!
Yeah, right, Gunslinger. There's a big difference between me and some old broad who creeps on kids in a strip bar.
Pfft. I bet I'm a helluva lot prettier than you ever were when you were a teenager, like 20 years ago.
Jeez, Senketsu, I think I might be wearing the most here! And you don't cover much.
Look at that, ya managed to put a dent in me. But you pervs are already wearin' less than a sailor uniform, so I got this.
Hey, I'm not, like, super covered-up or anything. How'm I winning?
Ryuko! Ryuko! I won't let you strip alone! You're my best friend!
Hold it! You can't just make Ryuko strip on round 1! She's way too cool to just lose like that! I, Mako Mankanshoku, will strip, too!
Ryuko! Are you OK? Do you need some of Mom's croquettes? I'll strip with you!
Don't be afraid, Ryuko! You're wearing the most out of anyone here! And I shall strip alongside you!
Who do you think you are, making Ryuko strip on round 1? She's the coolest one here! I'll even strip with her!
Hold it! Ryuko is just nervous on round 1 because she thinks you're all cute! Now I, Mako Mankanshoku, shall strip with her!
Losing on the first round? Ryuko only has one outfit! Do you know how hard it is for her to strip? I'll do it, too!
...Damn. Well, I'm sure not takin' Senketsu off...
There goes the flawless run. Hey, Senketsu, you wanna just squash these guys? (Start slow, Ryuko. Analyze them.) Aw, c'mon--!
Tch. I got plenty a' ways to stretch out a sailor uniform, you bastards--!
Ryuko! Ryuko! I won't let you strip alone! You're my best friend!
Hold it! You can't just make Ryuko strip on round 1! She's way too cool to just lose like that! I, Mako Mankanshoku, will strip, too!
Ryuko! Are you OK? Do you need some of Mom's croquettes? I'll strip with you!
Don't be afraid, Ryuko! You're wearing plenty of clothes for this table! And I shall strip alongside you!
Who do you think you are, making Ryuko strip on round 1? She's the coolest one here! I'll even strip with her!
Hold it! Ryuko is just nervous on round 1 because she thinks you're all cute! Now I, Mako Mankanshoku, shall strip with her!
Losing on the first round? Ryuko only has one outfit! Do you know how hard it is for her to strip? I'll do it, too!
Why's everyone wearin' so much, huh? All I got's a sailor uniform!
Why's everyone wearin' so much, huh? All I got's a sailor uniform...that talks. And gives me superpowers.
(Start with your shoes, Ryuko. Everyone here is well-covered.) Hey, I'm not stupid! N' I wouldn't just toss ya!
You pricks all look like you're in overcoats. Guess Satsuki Kiryuin figured you'd need all the clothes you could get.
Ryuko! Ryuko! I won't let you strip alone! You're my best friend!
Hold it! You can't just make Ryuko strip on round 1! She's way too cool to just lose like that! I, Mako Mankanshoku, will strip, too!
Ryuko! Are you OK? Do you need some of Mom's croquettes? I'll strip with you!
Don't be afraid, Ryuko! You're just losing because you've only got Senketsu on! And I shall strip alongside you!
Who do you think you are, making Ryuko strip on round 1? She's the coolest one here! I'll even strip with her!
Hold it! Ryuko is just nervous on round 1 because she thinks you're all cute! Now I, Mako Mankanshoku, shall strip with her!
Losing on the first round? Ryuko only has one outfit! Do you know how hard it is for her to strip? I'll do it, too!
Well, why don't I just kick these shoes off, then? I'll play your little long game. (Your stuff's safe with me, Ryuko!)
Why don't I start small? Seems to be the big strategy in this place. (Yah! Gotcha!)
Y'know how much I love these sneakers? Not enough to call it quits, damn it! (I'll keep your stuff safe, Ryuko!)
Hmph. Well, I don't need my shoes to kick your asses! (I'll take mine off too! And keep yours safe!)
Wait, slow down! Now you're from a whole different planet? You're not makin' sense!
Oh, so lesbos come from another planet, is that it? Now this whole thing's makin' sense--what's it called?
You gotta be kiddin' me! You dress like you're from a spy movie or somethin', you're datin' a girl, and now you're from outer space?
Wait, what's this crap about bein' from Planet Lesbo? We got enough aliens with the Life Fibers--where're you from?
Aw, damn it, you tricked me! Well, I'm part Life Fiber, and Senketsu here is part human! That's why we can sync up!
Alright, so you made me spill it! If you think that's out there, my uniform Senketsu is part human! So there!
(She clearly didn't know about you, Ryuko.) Tch! Senketsu just spoke--that's 'cause he's part human, the way I'm part Life Fiber!
Fine, I wasn't afraid to say it anyway! I'm part Life Fiber, and my uniform Senketsu is part human! He's been speakin' to me this whole time!
Aw, just shut up! I don't need to hear this crap from some weirdo gun-toting Annie Oakley bitch! I'm not gonna be a punk forever!
Tch--guess I'll stop talkin'. I'm not gonna end up like you, got it? I'm gonna find my father's killer, and then...get married, somethin'!
What, you think I'm gonna push drugs on the street or some crap? Soon as Satsuki Kiryuin goes down, I'll--I dunno, get married!
I'm not gonna be a punkass forever, damn it! You mighta given up on life, but I'm gonna settle down eventually somehow, you'll see!
Tch! Doesn't matter what I say--there's a weddin' dress with my name on it somewhere, got it? I'm gonna have a normal life one day!
OK, a dude. Hope you don't think you're gonna blow my mind.
Dudes strip in front a' me all the time. In fact, you could say I force 'em.
You look like every two-bit One-Star chump who thinks he can take me. All you need's a bowl cut.
So if you're one a' Satsuki Kiryuin's mooks, you probably get off on this sorta thing, right? Uh..."kneel before me, pig"?
Your turn, ~player~. ...Hey, did you hear me? I'm runnin' the show here!
~player~'s turn, go figure. C'mon, it's dinnertime soon.
You're the plainest-lookin' jerk here. You wanna hang out with the tough kids, then roll with me before I knock Satsuki Kiryuin off her perch.
Who're you supposed to be? ~player~? Buffer dudes have stood in my way, y'know.
Just another No-Star drone, looks like. What's your deal, some guy dare you to get photos a' Matoi's boobs?
Tell me if I got this one. You're one a' Satsuki Kiryuin's ass-kissers out to get me...or you just wanna be my boyfriend.
OK, a dude. Hope you don't think you're gonna blow my mind.
Dudes strip in front a' me all the time. In fact, you could say I force 'em.
You look like every two-bit One-Star chump who thinks he can take me. All you need's a bowl cut.
So if you're one a' Satsuki Kiryuin's mooks, you probably get off on this sorta thing, right? Uh..."kneel before me, pig"?
Your turn, ~name~. ...Hey, did you hear me? I'm runnin' the show here!
~name~'s turn, go figure. C'mon, it's dinnertime soon.
~player~'s turn, go figure. W-wait, I mean...~name~. Why'd I say that?
Someone rope you into this, too? Or are you as perverted as the guys?
Between girls, I think this is just a plot to make even the No-Stars get naked.
What's your story, huh? Always nice to get to know a girl before I pound her!
If you're expectin' any sympathy from Miss Loner Girl, then you never heard a' me, huh?
I'm the strippin' expert at this table, got it, bitch? W-wait, not like--not like a sex way!
So when you panic n' start swingin', you want me to deck ya with the gloved or the bare hand?
I've seen a lotta no-name girls crawlin' around Honnouji, bitch, and you might be the plainest of 'em all.
~player~, right? You look like a lost puppy, so stop kissin' Satsuki Kiryuin's ass now if you don't want me to squash ya.
Another store-brand No-Star girl? I'm not gonna go easy on ya just because you're in over your head, y'know.
So's the Student Council so desperate that they've sent Little Miss Two-Shoes ~player~ now? Do you even have a Goku Uniform?
Someone rope you into this, too? Or are you as perverted as the guys?
Between girls, I think this is just a plot to make even the No-Stars get naked.
What's your story, huh? Always nice to get to know a girl before I pound her!
If you're expectin' any sympathy from Miss Loner Girl, then you never heard a' me, huh?
I'm the strippin' expert at this table, got it, bitch? W-wait, not like--not like a sex way!
~player~'s turn, go figure. U-uh, ~name~, I mean. ~name~.
So when you panic n' start swingin', you want me to deck ya with the gloved or the bare hand?
That tiny little rapier supposed to scare me? You got almost nothin' on--I'll cut right through that dress!
Gimme a break. My Scissor Blade would snap that rapier in half like a damn toothpick--and then I'd aim for your dress!
You're a million years from blockin' my Scissor Blade with that needle you call a sword--I don't care if you've got height on me!
Get a bigger sword if you wanna scare me. I've beaten taller girls before--and got 'em to show a lot more than cleavage!
That toothpick of a rapier supposed to scare me? My Scissor Blade went toe-to-toe with Lady Satsuki's precious Bakuzan.
Who're you supposed to be, some kinda spacegirl? Your butt's stickin' out, and ya look miserable.
Are you some kinda astronaut? Is there a Bodysuit-n'-Stargazin' Club at Honnouji I should know about?
What's the deal with that suit, huh? You're not smilin' very much for a girl with her butt showin'--you an astronaut?
Uh...you sure that's the suit you wanna go with? You from outer space, where blue-haired girls show their butts off?
Bitch this, pussy that, blah, blah, blah. You sure talk a lot for an old bag with two dinky little pistols.
Jeez, and people bitch about my foul mouth. Cowgirl here's gonna hack up a lung if she keeps screamin' fuck.
I hear Gamagoori's part American--must be a whole country a' loudmouths, 'cause this bitch won't shut the hell up either.
No way you're a kid from Honnouji--you look like you're thirty, n' you can barely dress yourself. Keep screamin' swears if you want a beating!
Ugh, who is this girl? She's lookin' at me like she knows somethin' I don't! Hey, Purple-Pants, I'm talkin' to ya!
Hey, what's your deal, huh, Grape-Flavor? You're leerin' at me like I should know who you are! Hey!
Ugh, Senketsu, are you seein' "Zone-tan" over there? I dunno why, but she's givin' me butterflies! (Have you met her before?)
OK, I dunno why, Senketsu, but Purple Drink over there is givin' me the creeps! (I agree. She has a...knowing look.)
Ugh! Senketsu, is that Zone girl the one makin' you tingle all over? She's starin' at me like I should know her!
...I saw that comin'.
Damn, I was hopin' you'd just do the usual Honnouji thing of throwin' all your clothes off.
Better start stockpiling crap like that, 'cause you're gonna need a lot of it!
This thing cuts through Life Fibers, y'know. So don't make me do things the hard way!
If this perv's got small stuff to lose, I better think a' my answer to that...
You here to impress Lady Satsuki? Or maybe you just wanna impress me.
Oh, sure, doll yourself up with more crap. Clothes don't make the girl, y'know.
...This is gonna be a long one.
Shoulda figured! Hurry up n' take that crap off!
What do ya mean--you're some kinda alien? Are you doin' somethin' with the Life Fibers?
You're serious? Life Fibers are aliens, too--why should I trust you, huh?
W-what? The only aliens I know are the Life Fibers--don't mess with me!
Are you kiddin' me? If you're an alien, then I betcha you're some kinda Life Fiber trick! Start talkin'!
(Ryuko, you seem interested in this woman.) Wh-what, because she's dropping a little trinket?
Just the kinda friendly sisterhood I expect outta Honnouji girls.
...We gonna keep goin', or what?
Life Fibers are the stuff my uniform's made out of...n' I still don't trust ya. What was that crap about bein' all-girls?
Life Fibers make up the clothes people wear on Earth--at least the ones we can fight with. Now what'd you say about Muh-jer bein' all girls?
Life Fibers are like...alien clothes. You just dropped a whole buncha crap on me--somethin' about your home planet bein' fulla girls?
What, you want me to give a whole speech on Life Fibers? They're alien clothes--what'd you say about your woman-planet?
You want your precious Lady Satsuki to notice you, you better take off more than that.
There a reason we don't all have to wear the same thing? What kinda game is this?
(Ryuko, your blood tastes salty. Settle down.) What are you talkin' about?
Hey, Senketsu. If you wanna jump off me real quick n' make a face, I bet ~name~ would piss himself.
Hey, would you loosen up, Senketsu? You're squeezin' the life outta me!
You can't be serious with all this crap.
I don't have all night. If you keep wastin' my time, you can kiss that whole outfit goodbye.
~name~'s makin' me realize I might be underdressed for this...
A-already? That's--a lotta skin.
Now we're gettin' somewhere. Maybe you're one a' those dumbasses who likes it when girls beat him.
Yo, you changin' into your Goku Uniform? That's what it looks like.
Whatever. I've seen guys go way past underwear, weirdo.
...Hey, Senketsu, is my heart beatin' faster?
If you've ever seen me fight, then you know showin' a little underwear is no big deal! Do it!
Jeez, I haven't even kicked my shoes off yet...this girl's in her underwear.
You're in even worse shape than it looks, bitch. Let's just say I got a secret weapon.
...Normally I'm transformed when a guy starts takin' his shirt off.
Jeez, now he gets to show off his pecs or whatever. I like it better when it's 'cause I sliced their shirts off.
...Yeah, whatever. Buff guys try to impress me all the time, and I still kick their asses!
...Hmph. Maybe you're worth usin' the sharp edge a' this thing.
...Does he have to? I get enough a' this every day...
Go ahead, chump. Didn't even need my Scissor Blade!
Funny how normal it is at Honnouji to throw all your clothes off.
...Ouch. Now I feel kinda bad about taunting you...
...Why'd you play this game? Are you one a' those weirdos who gets off on girls laughing at it?
Oh, wow, it's like Sanageyama's. He swears it's 'cause Blade Regalia's cold.
Like you weren't pathetic enough at cards already! Just get lost!
Yeah, whatever, you're average. I've seen hundreds a' these things...w-wait, no, not like that!
A-agh! (Ryuko! Ryuko! Did ~name~ show his thingie yet? I saw you looking at him all googly-eyed!)
Wha--OK, yeah, no wonder you're a perv throwin' his clothes off.
Aw, who the hell do you think you are? You got a big thing, y'think I haven't seen any from fightin' Honnouji guys? Take a hike!
Guess that explains why you're a smug piece a' crap. Gamagoori's is big, too, I ain't in love with him.
...Are you losin' on purpose? Is this just tryin' to get guys to like you, showin' your boobs?
(Bare your boobs and beg for Ryuko's forgiveness! Join her in her fight against Honnouji's Student Council!) Mako, cool it!
...You're a No-Star student, right? Jeez...nothin' on your chest.
Well, hey. Jakuzure proves you don't need a rack to become a Three-Star.
Y'know what, Senketsu? You're feelin' pretty snug right now.
...Hey, Senketsu, do I have any Health class homework? (Two weeks' worth).
Look at that, ~name~, we match! Or we would, 'cept I got my full uniform on.
Well, hey, at least those boobs make up for your poker face.
Not gonna look...not watchin' 'em bounce...we got work to do here, Senketsu.
